books.author: Bonnie Garmus

books.title: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: Shel Van Pelt
books.description: A widow working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium is aided in solving a mystery by a giant Pacific octopus living there. Read by Marin Ireland and Michael Urie. 11 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
books.title: REMARKABLY BRIGHT CREATURES

books.author: Ann Napolitano
books.description: In a homage to Louisa May Alcott’s “Little Women,” a young man’s dark past resurfaces as he gets to know the family of his college sweetheart. Read by Maura Tierney. 15 hours, 7 minutes unabridged.

books.description: A former detective becomes the prime suspect in a murder case involving a man with mob ties who was in witness protection. Read by Lisa Flanagan and Corey Carthew. 11 hours, 45 minutes unabridged.
